text:
Wyatt Beetham Creech (born 13 October 1946) is an American-born New Zealand politician. He was Deputy Prime Minister in Jenny Shipley's National Party government from August 1998 to December 1999.
In the 2003 New Year Honours, he was appointed a Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit, for services as a Member of Parliament.

annotations.surface_form: Companion of the New Zealand Order of Merit
